MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH1 postcode area of Chester, affecting properties in Higher Ferry Lane, Sealand Road, Deeside Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at 1:46PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on our overhead line network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 4PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:25PM on Sunday 11th April 2021 .
